work.summary: Part of a team that built and maintained a User Interface component library for new web applications in use by Thomson Reuters North American Wealth Management branch. Components and Applications were built on Angular 6/TypeScript stack.
Worked as a Front-End Developer consultant at Johnson Controls building web apps using HTML, CSS, Angular/TypeScript.

Front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript/jQuery. Responsible for coming up with consistency guidelines for other Front-End developers. Served as a mentor to other developers. Building responsive websites from a designerâ€™s static PSD files. Making logical choices for breakpoint decisions. Experience working in Drupal and Django's Template Language. Experience building front-end interfaces for mobiles apps in iOS and Android using React Native. Working with clients such as Harley-Davidson, Harley Owners Group, Mercury Marine, SRAM, and Zoom Audio.

Front-end development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery, and Flash/ActionScript. Working with clients such as Harley-Davidson, Harley-Davidson Museum, Buell, Brunswick, Mercury Marine, SRAM, Zoom Audio, and Showtime.
Front-end development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Flash/ActionScript. Working with clients such as Harley-Davidson, Buell Motorcycles, SRAM, and US Bank. (EKG was acquired in 2004 by GS Design)
Front-end development using HTML, CSS, and Flash/ActionScript. Worked with clients such as Briggs & Stratton and Bridgestone/Firestone.

Interface design for web sites and interactive CD-ROMs, CD-ROM programming, front-end development, video production, 3D modeling, and animation. Did work with clients such as Caterpillar, Piper Aircraft, and The Packer Report.
